name: Zeta Fighter
description:
Welcome to Zeta Fighter! 

Character Select: Currently there are 2 characters, use left and right to shift between characters and confirm to select a character.

Controls:Player 1Player 2ControllerMovementWASDArrowsD-PadAttack/ConfirmJ or C1 or .B or CircleGuard/CancelK or  V2 or /R1

Special Moves: Double tap a directional key to Dash. Press Attack while Guarding to fire a long range attack.

Leave Feedback Here: Feedback Form
